thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A secret Gem
thread.title_full: A secret Gem - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Debra B
title: A secret Gem
text: This lovely hotel is close to the metro and round the corner from the Eiffel Tower and river Siene cruise. The rooms are small but so clean. The hotel staff are lovely and will accommodate whatever you need from extra milk to ringing taxis and sorting your flights home. I expected it to be noisy with where it is situated but we didn't hear a thing. We would definitely be back here.
